organisation_name: Rural Investment Support for Europe Foundation (RISE)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: The European Landowners' Organization (ELO) and the Friends of the Countryside (FCS)are both founders, close cooperation exists between RISE and these two organisations but there are no formal ties.  As a public utility Foundation, all the work of the Foundation remains independant and is not on the behalf of any interest group
goals__remit: RISE is a public utility foundation which aims to promote a sustainable, profitable and internationally competitive rural economy across Europe and to preserve the European countryside, its environment and biodiversity, and its cultural heritage and traditions.  It works through think tank work on agricultural and environmental issues, and by providing a platform for debate on key issues that affect the future environmental sustainability of European agriculture.
industry_forums: As invited speakers or attending as participants
relevant_communication:
Public Goods  
Sustainable Intensification of European agriculture 
Nutrient Recovery and Reuse from waste in European agriculture 
The appropriate balance of the European livestock sector 
'Out of the box' thinking for a new CAP
